text: kha phraphupenceakhxng kha phraxngkh pord hı phraxngkh thang sxng pen phu nxbnxm tx phraxngkh læa pord hı mi khun cak luk hlan khxng phwk phraxngkh sung prachachn thi nxbnxm tx phraxngkh læa pord sædng kæ kha phraxngkh sung phithi kar tha hacy khxng phwk kha phraxngkh læa pord xphaythosʹ kæ phwk kha phraxngkh dwy thæcring phraxngkh thrng pen phu xphaythosʹ thrng xendu metta
